Verses: 1 karththaraale Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vaarththai:
2 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Naan Unnode Sonna Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhikkol.

3 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Naan Isravelum Yoodhaavumaagiya En Janaththin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppi, Naan Avargal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththukku Avargalaith Thirumba Varappannuven; Adhai Avargal Sudhandhariththukkolluvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 ivaigal Karththar Isravelaiyum Yoodhaavaiyunkuriththu Sonna Vaarththaigale.
5 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Thaththalippin Saththaththaikketkirom; Thigilundu, Samaadhaanamillai.

6 aanaaip Pirandhavan Prasavikkiradhundo Endru Kettuppaarungal; Prasavikkira Sthreeyaippol Purushar Yaavarum Thangal Iduppugalinmel Thangal Kaigalai Vaiththirukkiradhaiyum, Mugangalellaam Maari Veluththirukkiradhaiyum Naan Kaangiradhenna?
7 aiyo! Andha Naal Periyadhu; Adhaippoloththa Naalillai; Adhu Yaakkobukku Ikkattukkaalam; Aanaalum Avan Adharku Neengalaagi Ratchikkappaduvaan.
8 annaalil Naan Avan Nugaththai Un Kazhuththinmel Iraadhapadikku Udaiththu, Un Kattugalai Aruppen Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; Anniyar Ini Avanai Adimai Kolvadhillai.
9 thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraiyum, Naan Thangalukku Ezhuppappogira Thangal Raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhaiyume Sevippaargal.

10 aagaiyaal En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobe, Nee Bayappadaadhe; Isravele , Kalangaadhe Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Idho, Naan Unnai Dhooraththilum, Un Sandhadhiyaith Thangal Siraiyiruppin Dhesaththilum Iraadhapadikku Ratchippen; Yaakkobu Thirumbi Vandhu Amarndhu Sugiththiruppaan; Avanaith Thaththalikkappannugiravanillai.

11 unnai Ratchippadharkaaga Naan Unnode Irukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Unnai Sidharadiththa Ellaa Jaadhigalaiyum Naan Nirmoolamaakkuven; Unnaiyo Naan Nirmoolamaakkaamalum, Mutrilum Dhandiyaamal Vidaamalum, Mattaai Dhandippen.
12 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Un Pun Aaraadhadhaayum Un Kaayam Kodiyadhaayum Irukkiradhu.
13 un Kaayangalaik Kattumpadi Unakkaaga Erpaduvaarillai; Unnai Sosthappaduththum Oushadhangalum Illai.

14 un Nesar Yaavarum Unnai Marandhaargal; Avargal Unnaith Thedaargal; Thiralaana Un Akkiramaththinimiththamum, Un Paavangal Balaththupponadhinimiththamum, Saththuru Vettum Vannamaagavum, Kodiyavan Dhandikkira Vannamaagavum Naan Unnai Dhandiththen.
15 un Norungudhalinaalum Un Vedhanaiyin Migudhiyinaalum Nee Kookkuraliduvaanen? Thiralaana Un Akkiramaththinimiththamum Balaththuppona Un Paavangalinimiththamum Ippadi Unakku Seydhen.

16 aadhalaal Unnaip Patchikkiravargal Yaavarum Patchikkappaduvaargal; Un Saththurukkalellaarum Siraippattuppovaargal; Unnai Sooraiyaadugiravargal Sooraiyaadappaduvaargal; Unnaikkollaiyidugira Anaivaraiyum Kollaikku Oppukkoduppen.
17 avargal: Unnai Visaarippaaratra Seeyon Endru Solli, Unakkuth Thallundaval Endru Perittapadiyaal, Naan Unakku Aarokkiyam Varappanni, Un Kaayangalai Aatruven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

18 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Naan Yaakkobudaiya Koodaarangalin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppi, Avan Vaasasthalangalukku Irakkancheyven; Nagaram Than Manmettinmel Kattappattu, Aramanai Munpola Nilaippadum.
19 avaigalilirundhu Sthoththiramum Aadalpaadalin Saththamum Purappadum; Avargalai Varththikkappannuven, Avargal Kurugippovadhillai, Avargalai Magimaippaduththuven, Avargal Sirumaippaduvadhillai.
20 avargal Pillaigal Munpoliruppaargal; Avargal Sabai Enakku Munbaagath Thidappadum; Avargalai Odukkina Yaavaraiyum Dhandippen.

21 avargaludaiya Prabu Avargalil Oruvanaayirukka, Avargaludaiya Adhipadhi Avargal Naduvilirundhu Thondruvaar; Avarai Sameebiththu Varappannuven, Avar Sameebiththu Varuvaar, Ennidaththil Serumpadi Than Irudhayaththaip Pinaippaduththugira Ivar Yaar? Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
22 neengal En Janamaayiruppeergal, Naan Ungal Dhevanaayiruppen.
23 idho, Koraavaarik Kaatraagiya Karththarudaiya Perungaatru Ukkiramaayezhumbi, Adiththu, Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Thalaiyinmel Modhum.
24 karththar Thammudaiya Irudhayaththin Ninaivugalai Nadappiththu Niraivetrumalavum, Avarudaiya Ukkirakobam Thaniyaadhu; Kadaisi Naatkalil Adhai Unarndhukolveergal.
